String.string: Please kill the {@Creature:47#1003#argon mugatos} that interrupt our work, and join us in removing petrified mushrooms.
They explode quite nicely, don't they?
While killing {@creature:47#1003#argon mugatos} in the {@Rgn:47003$$Bridgehead}, use bombs or weapons to break {@creature:47#7004#spore emitters}.
Go to {@Rgn:47008$$Eastwatch} and report to {@creature:247#1018$$Lenon Timbus}.
